Mascarpone Frosting

A light and creamy frosting with the delicate flavor of mascarpone, perfect for cakes or pastries.

Yield: About 1 cup

frosting

Ingredients

Frosting Ingredients

  • 4 oz mascarpone cheese, softened
  • 1/2 tsp vanilla extract
  • 1-2 cups powdered sugar

Procedure

Make the Frosting

  1. Cream the mascarpone cheese and vanilla together until smooth.
  2. Add powdered sugar half a cup at a time, mixing completely after each addition.
  3. Stop adding powdered sugar once the frosting reaches the desired sweetness and consistency.
